text.help:
§a!!CT help §f- §aDisplay help message
§a!!CT run <command name> §f- §aExecute command
§a!!CT reload §f- §aReload plugin
§a!!CT list §f- §aList all commands
text.welcome: Welcome to use ConvinceTool plugin, type §a!!CT help§f to display help message

message.command_no_permission: You don't have permission to use this command
